text.div:
Neonatal Jaundice

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
    Code Display
    17140000 Neonatal jaundice due to delayed conjugation (disorder)
    206439006 Neonatal jaundice with glucose-6-phosphate dehydrogenase deficiency (disorder)
    206442000 Perinatal jaundice from bruising (disorder)
    206443005 Perinatal jaundice from maternal transmission of drug or toxin (disorder)
    206446002 Perinatal jaundice from polycythemia (disorder)
    206447006 Perinatal jaundice from swallowed maternal blood (disorder)
    206448001 Perinatal jaundice from bleeding (disorder)
    206453006 Delayed conjugation causing neonatal jaundice associated with another disorder (disorder)
    206454000 Neonatal jaundice with Crigler-Najjar syndrome (disorder)
    206455004 Neonatal jaundice with Dubin-Johnson syndrome (disorder)
    206456003 Neonatal jaundice with Gilbert's syndrome (disorder)
    206457007 Neonatal jaundice with congenital hypothyroidism (disorder)
    206458002 Neonatal jaundice with porphyria (disorder)
    206459005 Neonatal jaundice with Rotor's syndrome (disorder)
    206469004 Perinatal jaundice due to congenital obstruction of bile duct (disorder)
    206470003 Perinatal jaundice due to galactosemia (disorder)
    206471004 Perinatal jaundice due to mucoviscidosis (disorder)
    21404001 Fetal OR neonatal jaundice from polycythemia (disorder)
    22067002 Fetal OR neonatal jaundice from drugs AND/OR toxins transmitted from mother (disorder)
    26291002 Fetal OR neonatal jaundice from swallowed maternal blood (disorder)
    275360003 Neonatal jaundice due to deficiency of enzyme system for bilirubin conjugation (disorder)
    276549000 Newborn physiological jaundice (disorder)
    276550000 Prolonged newborn physiological jaundice (disorder)
    359007 Kernicterus due to isoimmunization (disorder)
    387712008 Neonatal jaundice (disorder)
    47444008 Lucey-Driscoll syndrome (disorder)
    56921004 Perinatal jaundice from hereditary hemolytic anemia (disorder)
    6835002 Fetal OR neonatal jaundice from bruising (disorder)
    69347004 Neonatal jaundice due to delayed conjugation from delayed development of conjugating system (disorder)
    73749009 Neonatal jaundice associated with preterm delivery (disorder)
    73876000 Perinatal jaundice due to inspissated bile syndrome (disorder)
    82696006 Neonatal jaundice due to delayed conjugation from breast milk inhibitor (disorder)
    89062002 Fetal OR neonatal jaundice from infection (disorder)
